quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: The best motivation always comes from within.
author: Michael Johnson

quote: Champions aren't made in the gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside them -- a desire, a dream, a vision.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: To succeedâ€¦You need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you.
author: Tony Dorsett

quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterward.
author: Vernon Law

quote: If you can't accept losing, you can't win.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
author: Dan Reeves

quote: You can make mistakes, but you're not a failure until you start blaming others for those mistakes.
author: John Wooden

quote: Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement.
author: Matt Biondi

quote: We can't win at home. We can't win on the road. As general manager, I just can't figure out where else to play.
author: Pat Williams

quote: I'm a light eater. As soon as it's light, I start eating.
author: Art Donovan

quote: You can sum up this sport in two words: You never know.
author: Lou Duva

quote: We didn't tackle well today but we made up for it by not blocking.
author: John McKay

quote: It's only game. Why you have to be mad?
author: Ilya Bryzgalov

quote: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Relax? How can anybody relax and play golf? You have to grip the club, don't you?
author: Ben Hogan

quote: Concentration is a fine antidote to anxiety.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: Pressure is something you feel when you don't know what you're doing.
author: Peyton Manning

quote: Effective teamwork begins and ends with communication.
author: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: A hockey team is like a puzzle. Every piece is vital.
author: Bob Hartley

quote: The secret of winning football games is working more as a team, less as individuals. I play not my 11 best, but my best 11.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
author: Phil Jackson

quote: You cannot be serious!
author: John McEnroe

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Pressure is a privilege - it only comes to those who earn it.
author: Patrick Rifter

quote: I'd rather have the attitude of a champion than the trophy of a loser.
author: Kim Clijsters

quote: The only victory that counts is the one over yourself.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: I am a member of a team, and I rely on the team, I defer to it and sacrifice for it, because the team, not the individual, is the ultimate champion.
author: Mia Hamm
